# coordinateSpace

**Instance Property**

The coordinate space occupied by the scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var coordinateSpace: any UICoordinateSpace { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the provided coordinate space to get the bounds of the scene’s bounds rectangle and to convert points and rectangles to and from other coordinate spaces. For example, use [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWindowScene/coordinateSpace] to convert a point in the scene to the screen coordinate space.

## Deprecated symbols

- **interfaceOrientation**: The orientation to use when displaying content in your windows.
